dict.acceptation: 完全，整个地，全部地；百分之百；干净；

sent.orig: These two regions were, for Aristotle, totally distinct and totally different.
sent.trans: 在亚里士多德看来，这两个区域完全独立，截然不同。

sent.orig: It was a totally drought hit area all these days, It is totally unexpected.
sent.trans: 过去一段日子，这些地区遭遇了旱灾，所以洪灾是完全出乎意料的。

sent.orig: I am totally, totally over her.
sent.trans: 我完完全全忘记她，或者放下她了。

sent.orig: Quick answer: I totally, totally have cycles of increased and decreased production!
sent.trans: 快速回答：我和你一样，也有状态好和状态不好的时候！

sent.orig: My love so distress and, without any self, no personal feeling. My heart was totally hurt.
sent.trans: 我爱的如此狼狈不堪，爱的没有一点自我，我的心已经被伤透了。
